description: AMIP experiment (with SSTs and Sea Ice the same as in the amip experiment in the DECK) but with constant pre-industrial forcing levels (anthropogenic & natural) and run from 1870-present.
keywords: CFMIP, Tier 2, AMIP SST and SIC, pre-industrial forcing.
rationale: To examine whether climate feedbacks during the 20th century are different to those acting on long term climate change and climate sensitivity.

requirements.description: AMIP sea surface temperature boundary conditions derived from observational data.
requirements.keywords: AMIP, Sea surface temperature, AMIP, climate, modelling, SST, prescribed
requirements.label: AMIP SST

requirements.description: AMIP sea ice boundary conditions derived from observational data.
requirements.keywords: AMIP, Sea Ice, climate, modelling, AMIP, ipcc, seaIce, prescribed
requirements.label: AMIP SIC

requirements.keywords: Pre-industrial forcing, excluding carbon dioxide, excluding co2
requirements.label: PIForcingExcludingCO2

requirements.description: Initialisation is made from year 20 of the pre-industrial control.
requirements.label: PreIndustrialInitialisation

requirements.description: An Atmosphere only general circulation model configuration.
requirements.label: AGCM Configuration
